MK_ApprovedManage.sql: SELECT ID ,ApprovedGroupName, Sort ,ShowMark ,CreateUser ,CreateDate FROM dbo.MK_Type_ApprovedGroup ORDER BY Sort

SELECT t.RowID , t.ID ,t.ApprovedGroupID ,t.ApprovedGroupName , t.ApprovedTypeName , CASE WHEN t.HasTemplate IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS HasTemplate , t.ClassIconfont,t.BackgroundColor, t.Sort,t.ShowMark ,t.CreateUser ,t.CreateDate INTO #TableResult FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.CreateDate DESC ) AS RowID, a.ClassIconfont,a.BackgroundColor,a.Sort,a.ID,a.ApprovedGroupID,b.ApprovedGroupName, ApprovedTypeName,t.ID AS HasTemplate, a.ShowMark ,a.CreateUser ,a.CreateDate FROM MK_Type_ApprovedType a JOIN MK_Type_ApprovedGroup b ON b.ID = a.ApprovedGroupID LEFT JOIN dbo.MK_Type_ApprovedTemplate t ON t.ApprovedTypeID = a.ID ) as t ORDER BY t.RowID
SELECT TOP (@limit) * FROM #TableResult WHERE RowID > (@limit*(@page-1)) SELECT COUNT(ID) AS rows FROM #TableResult DROP TABLE #TableResult

SELECT * INTO #TableResult FROM V_ApprovedTemplate ORDER BY RowID SELECT TOP (@limit) * FROM #TableResult WHERE RowID > (@limit*(@page-1)) SELECT COUNT(ID) AS rows FROM #TableResult DROP TABLE #TableResult
